prompt_selector_select: Enter index to select, or 'q' to quit
prompt_selector_select_adv: Enter index, full path, or 'q' to quit
msg_export_completed: Export successful! Files saved to output directory.
prompt_output_path: Fixed Output Path (leave blank for auto):
msg_program_error: Program error detected! You can choose the following options:
msg_api_transient_error: This error is usually a network or provider issue. You can wait for automatic recovery, or if it persists, try the options below or check the QA list.
error_menu_analyze_llm: 1. Call online LLM API to analyze the error (requires API config)
error_menu_analyze_github: 2. Analyze and open GitHub to submit an issue (requires API config)
error_menu_update: 3. Try to update (Note: Sometimes it's already fixed but version not updated)
msg_llm_analyzing: Calling LLM to analyze the error, please wait...
msg_github_issue_template:
Please copy the following content and go to GitHub to submit an issue:

URL: https://github.com/ShadowLoveElysia/TranslateFlow/issues/new

Content:
msg_api_not_configured: Online API is not configured. Please configure it in API Settings or use the one-time configuration below.
msg_temp_api_prompt: You are currently using a local model or have no online API configured. Using an online model (e.g., GPT-4, Claude, Gemini) is recommended for more accurate traceback analysis.
menu_error_temp_api: 5. Configure a one-time Online API (for this session only)
msg_github_guide:
### How to submit an Issue?
1. Click the button below or visit GitHub Issues manually.
2. Click 'New Issue'.
3. Paste the generated template below into the description box.
4. Click 'Submit new issue'.
msg_confirm_llm_analyze_first: Would you like to analyze the error with LLM first? This provides better information for the issue. (y/n):
msg_ask_submit_issue: Detected that this error might be a code issue. Would you like to submit an issue on GitHub now? (y/n):
setting_auto_set_output_path: Output directory automatically follows input (ignore fixed setting)
setting_enable_context_enhancement_desc: Preserve source context when splitting mid-paragraph, improves coherence (slightly increases token usage)
setting_use_openai_sdk_desc: Use OpenAI SDK when enabled, raw HTTPX when disabled (mutually exclusive)
setting_enable_stream_api_desc: Smart detection of API streaming support, auto-detect on first request and cache result
setting_enable_prompt_caching_desc: Cache system prompts and glossaries to significantly reduce API costs (Anthropic/Google/Bedrock)
setting_enable_async_mode_desc: Use aiohttp async requests, ideal for high concurrency (100+), reduces thread switching overhead
setting_enable_rate_limit_desc: Strictly limit request rate when enabled, may slow down translation, suitable for APIs with strict quotas
setting_custom_rpm_limit_desc: Max requests per minute, 0 uses platform default
setting_custom_tpm_limit_desc: Max tokens per minute, 0 uses platform default
editor_no_cache: No project cache found. Please run translation first.
editor_using_existing: Using existing cache data from memory
editor_no_data: No translation data found in cache
editor_failed_start: Failed to start editor. Check if translation data exists.
editor_shortcuts_edit: [Arrow Keys] Move Cursor [Home/End] Line Start/End [R] Save [Esc] Cancel | Editing...
editor_save_warning: Warning: Some changes may not have been saved!
editor_cache_pattern_tip: Cache files should be located in directories with pattern: */cache/AinieeCacheData.json
editor_proofread_cache_found: AI proofread version of cache file detected
setting_detailed_logs: Show Detailed Translation Logs (Enable Comparison Mode)
setting_retry_backoff: Enable Auto Retry on Request Failure (Exponential Backoff)
setting_github_status_bar_desc: Display latest Commit and Release info in status bar
msg_notification_body: Your task [{}] has been completed successfully!
msg_cache_corrupted: WARNING: Main cache corrupted! Attempting recovery from backup...
msg_cache_heal_fail: ERROR: Cache recovery failed, no usable backups found.
msg_dry_run_confirm: Confirm the Prompt above is correct and start formal tasks?
msg_dry_run_hint: (Note: You can disable this preview in the Settings menu)
msg_high_concurrency_hint: Tip: High concurrency ({0}) detected. Consider enabling 'Async Request Mode' in Advanced Settings for better performance
msg_api_select_online: Please select an Online API preset
msg_api_select_local: Please select a Local API preset
tip_api_official: Tip: Official presets have built-in URLs. Just provide the Key and update the Model name if needed.
tip_api_custom: Tip: Custom platforms require a full API URL, Key, and Model name.
prompt_enter_path: Please enter a valid input path (or 'q' to quit)
msg_murasaki_think_hint: Murasaki models are reasoning/thinking models. Please enable reasoning mode and adjust the thinking budget in settings!
warn_path_change: Warning: Changing default paths may cause files to be lost or overwritten. Ensure the new path is safe.
tip_thread_count: Tip: For Local LLMs, thread count must match the backend's concurrency limit (Slots) to avoid errors. 5-10 is recommended for online APIs.
warn_project_type: Warning: Incorrect project type may cause parsing failures. Only change if you are sure about the file format.
tip_line_mode: Tip: 20 lines is recommended for most cases. Setting this too high may lose context.
warn_token_mode_severe: CRITICAL WARNING: Token limit is usually auto-analyzed. Fixing it manually often degrades translation quality!
phrase_confirm_risk: I acknowledge and ignore the risk
msg_no_paste: Paste detected! Please type each character manually to confirm.
msg_online_features_warning: Warning: Local API in use. Advanced features like Characterization/World Building will be ignored.
err_not_file: Error: Path is not a file or does not exist.
err_not_folder: Error: Path is not a directory or does not exist.
msg_json_root_error: JSON root must be a list.
prompt_profile_rename: Enter new name for current profile
msg_profile_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to PERMANENTLY delete '{}'?
prompt_custom_api_name: Enter name for the new custom platform (Alphanumeric)
msg_custom_api_created: Custom platform '{}' created. Select it from the list to configure.
msg_already_in_pool: API is already in the pool
msg_web_server_started_bg: Web server started in background, opening monitor...
tip_failover_logic: Tip: Only online APIs support rotation. When consecutive errors reach the threshold, the system will retry in-place and switch APIs.
msg_task_ended: Task ended. Press Enter to return to main menu...
msg_enter_output_path: Cache not found, please enter the correct output path (or 'q' to quit):
msg_estimating: Pre-scanning to estimate cost and time...
msg_ref_only: Note: Estimates are for reference only. Actual tokens depend on service provider.
help_task: Specify the task to run (translate, polish, export). If omitted, opens the interactive menu.
help_input: Path to the input file or directory to process.
help_output: Specify the output directory (optional, defaults to a folder next to input).
help_profile: Use a specific configuration profile (optional, defaults to the last active one).
help_source: Override the source language from the config (optional).
help_target: Override the target language from the config (optional).
help_resume: Attempt to resume the task from existing cache (optional).
help_yes: Automatically answer 'yes' to all confirmation prompts (e.g., resume task).
check_untranslated_retry_limit_desc: (This value affects detection accuracy. Keep default if unsure)
check_untranslated_reduction_rate_desc: (Source language character reduction below this rate is considered untranslated, default 0.5 = 50%)
msg_epub_conv_start: [cyan]Cache not found, calling conversion middleware for {}...[/cyan]
msg_web_dist_missing: [Tip] Web bundle not found (dist/index.html). The web interface won't work without it.
msg_web_setup_fail: Setup failed. Check network or environment.
msg_press_enter_after_save: Please edit and save in the editor, then return here and press Enter to reload...
msg_tui_takeover_main: Current task monitoring has moved to WebServer
msg_tui_takeover_sub: TUI panel is taken over, please check progress on WebServer
menu_output_exists_prompt: An existing output directory was found. What would you like to do?
err_resume_no_cache: [bold red]Cannot resume: No cache file found.[/bold red]
msg_overwrite_confirm: [bold red]WARNING: This will permanently delete '{}' and all its contents. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?[/bold red]
prompt_toggle_plugin: Enter ID to toggle plugin enable status
msg_queue_editor_not_available: Queue editor not available (only available in queue mode)
msg_web_queue_not_available: Web queue manager not available (only available in queue mode)
msg_queue_tui_help: Press [H] to open full queue management interface in browser
msg_web_server_timeout: Web server startup timeout, but queue page might still be accessible
msg_press_e_again_to_edit: Press [E] again to enter edit mode
msg_tui_edit_limitation: Sorry, TUI real-time hot switching is currently not implemented. Please use the Web interface for this feature. If you have good ideas, welcome to submit a PR to this project. Thank you for your contribution!!!
msg_use_h_key_for_web: üí° Press [H] key to quickly open the Web queue management interface
msg_task_moved: [INFO] Task '{}' moved (position: {} ‚Üí {}), hot reload queue list successful
msg_task_updated: [INFO] Task '{}' configuration updated, hot reload queue list successful
msg_queue_editor_help: Save and close the file after editing to reload the queue
msg_task_locked_cannot_remove: Task is locked and cannot be removed
msg_task_locked_cannot_move: Task is locked and cannot be moved
msg_task_locked: Task is currently {} and cannot be modified
msg_queue_no_more_tasks: System: No more pending tasks in queue
msg_queue_task_moved_to_end: System: Task [{}] moved to end of queue (position #{})
prompt_new_prompt_name: Enter name for new prompt file
msg_multi_line_hint: Enter content (Type 'EOF' on a new line to finish):
msg_confirm_clear_file: Content is empty. Confirm clear file?
warning_advanced_setting: This is an advanced setting. Modifying it may affect performance and stability.
confirm_modify_advanced: Are you sure you want to modify this setting?
warning_dependency_not_met: Please enable '{}' first before modifying this setting.
prompt_toggle_or_back: Enter ID to toggle, or q/b/0/Enter to go back
setting_enable_post_conversion: Auto-convert output format after translation (E-book only)
setting_fixed_output_format_switch: Fixed output format (skip asking each time)
msg_format_conversion_hint: E-book detected. Will convert to your selected format after translation
msg_calibre_not_found: Calibre not detected. This tool is required for format conversion
msg_calibre_manual_hint: Please install and re-run the task
opt_calibre_download: Auto download and install (Recommended, Windows only)
setting_operation_logging_desc: Record user operations to send to LLM for more accurate error analysis
banner_op_log_hint_on: Sensitive info redacted, better LLM analysis on errors
banner_op_log_hint_off: Enable for more accurate LLM analysis
banner_auto_proofread_hint: Auto AI proofreading after translation, incurs additional API costs
banner_github_fetch_failed: Unable to connect to Github, failed to fetch latest Commit and Release
banner_beta_warning: Note: You are on a Beta version, there may be issues. Please submit an issue for fixes/improvements
msg_api_error_hint: [Y] Multiple API errors detected, press Y for self-diagnosis
msg_no_error_detected: No error detected. Please run a task first or search issues manually
prompt_tbx_source_lang: Source language code (e.g., en, zh, ja)
prompt_tbx_target_lang: Target language code (e.g., zh, en, ja)
msg_prompt_test_warning: Warning: This will send the entire file content to the API at once!
msg_prompt_test_trim: Please trim the file content yourself, keep only a small amount of test text to avoid excessive Token consumption.
msg_prompt_test_note: Note: Testing will consume API Tokens, please use with caution.
prompt_select_test_file: Please select a file to test:
err_no_content: Error: Unable to read file content
err_no_text: Error: No translatable text in file
option_pure_prompt: Pure prompt only (disable glossary, character settings, etc.)
option_full_config: Full config test (enable all active features)
msg_glossary_analysis_warning: Local LLM is not recommended for analysis, quality may be poor.
msg_glossary_analysis_hint: Use online API for better results, but API fees may apply.
msg_glossary_accuracy_note: Note: Analysis accuracy depends on your API model capability. This is only a preliminary analysis - manual review is recommended before use.
proofread_warning_llm: This feature depends on LLM capability, reasoning models recommended
proofread_warning_cost: Proofreading will incur additional API costs
setting_enable_auto_proofread_desc: Automatically run AI proofreading after translation, incurs additional API costs
option_translate_batch: Batch (all terms at once, faster but single result)
msg_term_skipped_count: terms skipped due to translation failure
setting_term_translation_rounds_desc: Number of translation requests per term during AI analysis
term_selector_hint: Press number to select, w/s to switch term, r to retry, o to save current, e to edit, f to save all, q to quit
terminal_compat_detected_ssh: Detected SSH terminal, may not support full ANSI features
terminal_compat_detected_limited: Current terminal may not support full ANSI color features
terminal_compat_wt_better: Windows Terminal provides better ANSI color and Unicode support for improved display
terminal_compat_ssh_better: Consider using an SSH client with 256-color or truecolor support (e.g., Windows Terminal, iTerm2, Tabby)
terminal_compat_general_better: Consider using a modern terminal with ANSI truecolor support for best display
terminal_compat_opt_manual: Manually open Windows Terminal for better visual experience
terminal_compat_opt_auto: Automatically restart in Windows Terminal for better visual experience
terminal_compat_opt_auto_default: Restart in Windows Terminal and set as default terminal
terminal_compat_opt_skip: Skip for now (may have display issues)
terminal_compat_manual_hint: Please open Windows Terminal manually, then run this program.
terminal_compat_manual_search: Tip: Search 'Windows Terminal' or 'wt' in Start Menu
terminal_compat_manual_store: Or install Windows Terminal from Microsoft Store
terminal_compat_wt_not_found: Windows Terminal not found. Please install it manually.
terminal_compat_install_from_store: You can install Windows Terminal from Microsoft Store
warn_sampling_params: WARNING: Modifying sampling parameters will significantly affect model output quality and style. Improper settings may severely degrade translation quality!
warn_sampling_params_desc: These parameters control the model's randomness and creativity. Some LLMs may not support certain parameters (e.g., Anthropic doesn't support penalty params, Gemini 2.5+ doesn't support penalty params). Please check your specific model's documentation before making changes.
confirm_sampling_change: Are you sure you want to modify this parameter? Type 'YES' to confirm:
hint_top_p: Nucleus sampling, used with temperature, recommended 0.9-1.0
hint_presence_penalty: Penalizes tokens already present, -2 to 2, recommended 0
automation_cooperation_hint: Cooperation: Folder Watch (Collect Mode) detects files ‚Üí adds to queue ‚Üí Scheduled Tasks batch process at set time
scheduler_usage_hint: Cron format: min hour day month weekday (e.g., 0 2 * * * = daily at 2am)
watch_usage_hint: Instant Mode: translate immediately | Collect Mode: queue only, batch process with scheduled tasks
scheduler_cron_hint: Format: min hour day month weekday (e.g., 0 2 * * * = daily at 2am)
scheduler_confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this scheduled task?
watch_debounce_hint: Wait for file write completion to avoid processing incomplete files
watch_move_done: Move to done directory after completion
watch_confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this watch rule?
watch_mode_instant_desc: Start translation immediately when new file detected
watch_mode_collect_desc: Add to queue only, process with scheduled tasks
msg_id_exists: ID already exists, please use another
create_team_description: Create a new team to start collaborating
team_slug_help: Lowercase letters, numbers and hyphens only
team_description_placeholder: Describe the team's goals and purpose
create_first_team: Create your first team to start collaborating
confirm_delete_team: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.
invite_member_description: Invite a new member to join the team via email
role_help: Admins can invite and manage members
team_name_slug_required: Team name and slug are required
team_created_success: New team has been successfully created
invitation_sent_success: Team invitation has been sent to email
member_removed_success: Team member has been successfully removed
